summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. A cyclist is seen on the left side of the road, and a pedestrian is walking on the right side. The vehicle maintains a steady speed and direction throughout the segment.
actions: The vehicle is driving at a consistent speed, maintaining its lane and direction. There are no sudden changes in speed or direction observed.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, riding steadily. 2) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 5 meters away, walking along the roadside.
